description.displayText:
Alicia is an incredible nanny who has been with us since my son was 2 months old. She is experienced, calm, organized, completely dependable, punctual, and a natural with all children. She also goes above and beyond to clean the house, take out the trash, cooks meals and always does the laundry for the house.
A mother herself, she has no problem managing the kids and their different schedules, moods, and needs. She is proactive about finding activities and making play dates with other kids and nannies. She takes every opportunity to teach letters, numbers and new words while working on gross and fine motor skills. She is completely trustworthy - she has stayed with our son for weeks while my partner and I went on our honeymoon and multiple weekends while we've had work travel. 
Alicia has become like a family member to us and, unfortunately, we are moving out of state and she is unable to join us. Any family would be blessed to have Alicia's love and support in their home.

description.displayText: Alicia is great with my baby girl. Always on time, caring, full of love and energy. She also helped me with household chores. Baby girl loves her.
description.originalText: Alicia is great with my baby girl. Always on time, caring, full of love and energy. She also helped me with household chores. Baby girl loves her.

description.displayText: Alicia is fabulous! She has been a daily housekeeper for our family for over a year and handles all day to day care for our family's home. She is a great thorough cleaner but she has also stepped up to do anything else I ask her to do - which as a working mom with three kids is a lot! She does food shopping, sews badges on the kids' karate uniforms, helped house train our puppy, meets the electrician (or any other contractor), drops off dry cleaning, coordinates with the dry cleaners to have it delivered when she is at the house etc. In short, she picked up on the rhythm of our house quickly and is eager to help in any way that she can - an invaluable resource in a busy household! (Quick note - I don't speak ANY Spanish. Alicia and have communicated using google translate/texts and it hasn't been an issue at all.)

description.displayText: Alicia is wonderful!  She had worked for our family for over 1 year---cleaning, cooking, and caring for our toddler in the afternoons.  Our son loves her! She is dependable, kind, and a wonderful cook. If you would like a verbal recommendation, please message her for my contact information. I am happy answer any questions you may have.

description.displayText: Alicia was polite, professional and diligent.  She was helpful in cleaning and organizing our home and competitively priced.  She goes above and beyond to ensure she addresses all tasks and areas to bring our family comfort.  She's a lovely person and we are so happy to have found her.

description.displayText: Alicia worked for me for about 5 months as a housekeeper.  She was excellent at cleaning and also a very good cook.
